channel.title: OzhcReborn | REOPENED | Fresh start | 100% UPTIME
channel.description:
[img]http://i80.servimg.com/u/f80/14/94/11/18/ozhc110.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Welcome to OzhcReborn![/size]
OzhcReborn Forums - [url=http://board.ozhcreborn.com]http://board.ozhcreborn.com[/url] OzhcReborn Play Now - [url=http://www.ozhcreborn.com/play.php]www.ozhcreborn.com/play.php[/url]
To start off the introduction, we withhold the name 'OzhcReborn'. The reason for having 'Reborn' in our name is because we are not a "new" server. Ozhc has been around since January of 2011. As many of you know, we started out with the name of OzhcScape. Now we are back in business and ready to succeed in becoming one of the top RSPS. Ozhc wants to be known as one of the best private servers out there, and you can help us achieve that. We have no doubts that this server will become very populated and and well known in the near future. Ozhc is still under the same management as it was in January of 2011; not to be worried, there are many moderator positions to be filled as we grow numerously.
Many thanks to all of the previous members that support us and hopefully will still support us. We would love to see all of our old members join us again on a journey to success. Also, a huge thanks to all of the new members that plan on joining. There will be plentiful opportunities for our members in the future.
[size=14pt]SERVER INFORMATION:[/size]
[color=teal] [ul][list] [li]We are currently being hosted on a very stable VPS[/li] [li]Currently adding quests for players to complete and gain quest-only items (RFD currently added)[/li] [/list] [list] [li]Donor Island has many advantages over Non-Donors[/li] [li]Ozhc has many different PK'ing areas to battle your enemies[/li] [/list] [list] [li]We have added 634 items to the server giving players a large range of variety and independence[/li] [li]Ozhc has many Minigames to spare your time[/li] [/list] [list] [li]Many shops to choose from at home[/li] [li]Many prestigious bosses to face your biggest fears[/li] [/list] [list] [li]Vote4Items has been added![/li] [li]Moderator Opportunities will be available as we gain players[/li] [/list]
As stated above, we would love to see everyone join the server. Administrators will host raffles as we gain more players, so make sure you are here when those raffles happen, because you could be the lucky winner.
Many thanks, OzhcReborn Staff Team
PICTURES: [img]http://i80.servimg.com/u/f80/14/94/11/18/steadf10.png[/img] [img]http://i80.servimg.com/u/f80/14/94/11/18/regefi10.png[/img] [img]http://i80.servimg.com/u/f80/14/94/11/18/glaive10.png[/img] [img]http://i80.servimg.com/u/f80/14/94/11/18/tokhaa10.png[/img] - All of these items have been custom added to the server! [img]http://i80.servimg.com/u/f80/14/94/11/18/altar10.png[/img] - Much easier to level prayer [IMG]http://i44.servimg.com/u/f44/14/94/11/18/home11.png[/img] - Shops are spread out throughout buildings in varrock. You can find your necessities in any shop. [IMG]http://i44.servimg.com/u/f44/14/94/11/18/traini10.png[/img] - Low level training. This can be for new-comers as rock crabs are one of the easiest monsters to kill in Ozhc. [IMG]http://i44.servimg.com/u/f44/14/94/11/18/donato10.png[/img] - The Donor Tab can only be accessed by Donors.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kxqmVFmBWFA]Ozhcscape Money Making guide - YouTube[/url][/ul]

Nice job on the server.[/quote]Thank you Ambokile.

item.title: OzhcReborn | REOPENED | Fresh start | 100% UPTIME
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:9, topic:520902”]All he was saying is that you stated you had a unique home when you clearly don’t and therefore shouldn’t call it unique. He wasn’t bashing you, he was just stating what be believes about the server. Try not to take offence so easily and listen to what others have to say, there might be some good ideas out there.[/quote]In my eyes, I see the home as unique because I’ve had it since 2011, NOT TO SAY it isn’t unique in other peoples’ minds. Even though people have it as their home, mine has been this way for years and is completely different than everyone elses. Not trying to start an argument, just stating my opinion.

Now… On-topic:
Everyone come take a look at the server. Pictures do no justice, you’ll have to come try it out!

Read full topic

Nice!

Are You Serious Or Just Joking?

Go On Rswebclients, You’ll See Atleast 100 Servers That Have The SAME Home, SAME Donator Panel and The SAME Shops

Exactly, that’s Rswebclients. I was the first to make this area the home back in January of 2011 and it won’t change. Do you realize how many people have EDGEVILLE as their home? I’ll answer that for you… about 75%.
[/quote]
I’m pretty sure google had Piscatoris as their home first. Anyway, changing the home does not make a server unique.[/quote]Then why even bother griping about my home if it doesn’t make it unique anyways? Anyways, no need to bash me
